description:
11.124 hwupload_cuda
Upload system memory frames to a CUDA device.

It accepts the following optional parameters:

device.description: The number of the CUDA device to use

name: hwupload_cuda

parameters.description: The number of the CUDA device to use
parameters.name: device

source:
11.124 hwupload_cuda

Upload system memory frames to a CUDA device.

It accepts the following optional parameters:

device

The number of the CUDA device to use
